review_title: All advanced practice providers AVOID THIS PLACE LIKE THE PLAGUE!!!!!
job_title: Advanced Practice Provider (NP/PA) in Rochester, MN
pros: The ONLY redeeming quality of this place is that fellow colleagues and staff are great! You are essentially suffering together.
cons: Upper, middle and lower management are HORRIBLE! They require you to fulfill tasks that are not in your job description and repeatedly use the term “based on departments current needs”. So if you’re hired for any specialty be prepared for them to tell you that you will no longer be working there because they need you elsewhere. They don’t care if you don’t feel comfortable with the switch. They will also change your work schedule when they feel like it. General practitioners suffer the most especially walk-in clinic staff so word of advice: avoid any jobs at Acute/Fastcare clinics. You’ll be miserable everyday of your life there. Truthfully most providers here are currently looking for other opportunities. So if you are fortunate to have options save yourself the trouble and don’t pick this place. They don’t pay you enough to also overwork you and stress you out.

job_title: Registered Nurse%2C BSN in Rochester, MN
pros: I have loved working here. My co-workers have made it a great experience.
cons: The recent vx mandate has changed the culture here. My religious and medical needs not acknowledged by administration. Feeling unheard and unvalued unfortunately. Prior to this mandate everything had been amazing.
